InstalledItem.Name: AllStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S2 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 2

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: M3A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 1

The M3A is Behring's entry level laser autocannon. The autocannon configuration offers modest damage per projectile and a fairly low rate of fire. As the most basic offering in Behring's weapons lineup, it features low power consumption, but poor power efficiency. It makes up ground for its shortcomings by being cheap, a feature many pilots are looking for when outfitting their ships on a budget.

InstalledItem.Name: Reliant Gilroy Gimbal
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Weapon Mount (Reliant Exclusive)
Manufacturer: MISC
Size: 4 

MISC built the Gilroy as a custom wing mounted gimbal for use exclusively with the Reliant. Standard on the Tana, it allows an S3 weapon better movement when tracking targets.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: Reliant Tana Missile Launcher
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Launcher
Manufacturer: MISC
Size: 5
Missiles: 8xS2 

Bespoke missile launcher built into the wings of the Tana to make this Reliant variant a deceptively deadly dogfighter.

InstalledItem.Name: StrikeForce II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The StrikeForce is the latest culmination of Thermyte Concern's expansion into the missile industry, showcasing notable design and cross-section targeting improvements.

InstalledItem.Name: StrikeForce II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 2

The StrikeForce is the latest culmination of Thermyte Concern's expansion into the missile industry, showcasing notable design and cross-section targeting improvements.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: RSI Self Destruct Long
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] RSI Self Destruct Long

InstalledItem.Name: Ping
InstalledItem.Description: Ping

InstalledItem.Name: Regulus
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

The Regulus is the power plant you can count on when everyone is counting on you. Made to exceed exacting military standards, Aegis’ design team has made sure that you have the extra power you need, when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Beacon
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Wei-Tek has made other mil-spec component manufacturers sit up and take notice with the introduction of the highly praised Beacon quantum drive.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: MISC Reliant Ship Armor
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] MISC Reliant Ship Armor

InstalledItem.Name: MISC Reliant - Decoy Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] MISC Reliant - Decoy Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: MISC Reliant - Noise Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] MISC Reliant - Noise Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: Capston
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Experience why WillsOp is a premiere manufacturer of ship electronics with their Capston radar. Outfit your ship with one today so you know what’s nearby.
